title: #303:  Women on the Verge
description:
When Bravo airs a season premiere, a season finale, and a reunion within 48 hours, you can be sure of one thing: WOMEN GOING NUTS. We have all the crazy, from Shannon's bitterness towards Vicki to Kathryn's feud with Landon to LeeAnne's general anger towards everything. So much fun that it took us 3 hours to cram it all in. Happy listening!

00:00:50 - Introduction
00:07:04 - Crappens Mailbag
00:17:49 - Real Housewives of Orange County Season 11 Premiere!
01:29:46 - Southern Charm Season 3 Finale!
02:21:36 - Real Housewives of Dallas Season 1 Reunion
